prodNameE: Beckman Coulter IOTestCD3-FITC / CD4-PE monoclonal antibody
ingredientsDesc:
Specifications
Specificity 	CD3	CD4
Clone	UCHT1	13B8.2
Hybridoma	NS1 x Balb/c	NS1 x Balb/c
Immunogen	Peripheral blood human lymphocytes	Human thymocytes
Immunoglobulin	IgG1	IgG1
Species	Mouse	Mouse
Source	Ascites	Ascite
Purification	Protein A affinity chromatography	Protein A affinity chromatography
Fluorochrome	FITC	PE
λ excitation	488 nm	488 nm
Emission	525 nm	575 nm
Buffer	PBS pH 7.2 plus 2 mg / mL BSA and 0.1% NaN3

applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: 一種螢光標定的抗體混合物，配合流式細胞儀進行多重參數分析。可用來偵測白血球細胞上的CD3和CD4抗原的表現。
